A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The Last Jedi seemed okay as I was watching it\, but as I left the theater and digested what I had just seen\, the glaring plot holes and betrayals/undoing of previous character progression and story arcs actually started to make me a little angry with it. Now I'm just disappointed at all it could have been but failed to be. Should have been way better. Not a movie I would care to see a second time. The original trilogy is something I will watch again and again and share with my kids some day. This one was just a one time viewing\, throw away movie. I dare say that even Phantom Menace was better. As an audience member I'm insulted that Hollywood feels this kind of rubbish is good enough.
